sentences.en: Formal talks are still said to be a possibility, not a probability.
sentences.cn: 据称正式会谈仍有可能，但可能性不大。

sentences.en: He must calculate the probability of failure.
sentences.cn: 他必须计算一下失败的概率.

sentences.en: His story-telling can push the bounds of probability a bit far at times.
sentences.cn: 他讲故事的时候，不时会有些夸大。

sentences.en: If the pool was open, we'd in all probability still be swimming in it.
sentences.cn: 如果游泳池还开着，我们完全可能还在里面游泳。

sentences.en: If you've owned property for several years, the probability is that values have increased.
sentences.cn: 如果一处房产已经拥有多年，有可能它已经增值了。

sentences.en: In all probability, the final upturn in their fortunes is some months away yet.
sentences.cn: 很可能再过数月他们才会转运。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister is now 64 years old and in all probability this will be the last election that he is likely to contest.
sentences.cn: 首相现年64岁，这多半将会是他可能参加的最后一次选举了。

sentences.en: The probability is that prices will rise rapidly.
sentences.cn: 物价有可能会迅速上升。

sentences.en: The probability that it will rain today is high.
sentences.cn: 今天下雨的可能性很大.

sentences.en: There is every probability of his coming.
There is little probability of his succeeding / that he will succeed.
There's an excellent probability that unless action is quickly taken, pipes will freeze.
sentences.cn: 除非立即采取行动，否则管道很有可能冻住。

sentences.en: This settled the probability of acquaintanceship.
sentences.cn: 这样就有了相识的可能.

sentences.en: Without a transfusion, the victim's probability of dying was 100%.
sentences.cn: 如果不输血，患者必死无疑。

sentences.en: You must decide whether, on the balance of probabilities , he committed the crime.
sentences.cn: 你们一定要权衡正反两方面的可能性，然后再裁定他是否犯罪。

words.tran_cn: 概率性的；或然说的，盖然论的
很可能的事；大有希望的候选者

phrases.tran_cn: 概率论与数理统计；概率与统计
机率密度函数；概率密度分布函数
故障几率；失效概率；崩塌概率

trans.tran_cn: 可能性，几率，概率，或然性
trans.tran_en: how likely something is, sometimes calculated in a mathematical way
